text: Kereta Api Indonesia (or KAI) is a railway company in indonesia. Began operation in 1945 from former railway ompanies like Statspoorwegen,NIS,and others. The company starts with name-brand DKA (Djawatan Kereta Api),Later PJKA ,PT.Kereta Api and PT.KAI. Category:Rail transport in Asia Category:Transport in Indonesia Category:Companies of Indonesia Category:West Java
title: Kereta Api Indonesia
